about.title: About Carolina de Canadá
about.intro: The goal of Carolina de Canadá is to be a resource for those who have enjoyed my baking and recipes, heard of their fame, or for those who have discovered them by chance.
about.mission_text: I am dedicated to sharing the best of Canadian culinary traditions with a bilingual audience, bridging cultural communities through the universal language of food.
about.unique_text: The recipes you find here are authentically Canadian, with some special adaptations that make them incredible. Every recipe is shared in both English and Spanish with love.
